text: Yıldız Technical University is a university in Turkey. It is found in Beşiktaş,İstanbul. The university has three campuses in Davutpasa, Yıldız and Ayazağa. It is a public university. == Departments == * Civil Engineering * Architecture * İnternational Relationships * Electronics and Communication Engineering * Electrical Enginnering * Mechanical Engineering Category:Colleges and universities in Turkey
title: Yıldız Technical University
